description.value:
Cold

Aura 5

A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura takes 30 cold damage. The ground is treated as difficult terrain, and creatures flying in the aura (other than the dragon) move at half speed. Creatures in the aura have concealment against ranged attacks.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Reach 4

+29 vs AC; 1d12+8 damage plus 4d10 cold damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+29 vs AC; 2d12+8 damage.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy hits rime with a melee attack, at-will

Rime attacks the target; reach 4; targets the triggering enemy; +27 vs Fortitude; 2d12+8 damage, and the target slides 5 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Rime makes two claw attacks. If she hits a single target with both claws, she pulls the target 3 squares and makes a bite attack against it

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Close burst 8

+28 vs Fortitude; 3d10+10 cold damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 10

+28 vs Fortitude; 5d10+10 cold damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of Rime's next turn. In addition, Rime makes a secondary attack against the same target.

Secondary Attack +27 vs Fortitude; the target is slowed and its cold resistance is negated until the end of the encounter. Aftereffect: The target takes 10 cold damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Cold

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Rime's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +27 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Rime's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

HP 1230; Bloodied 615
Resist 40 cold 		Init +17 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 43Fort 43Ref 39Will 38
Speed 9 (ice walk), fly 9 (hover), overland flight 18
Ability ScoresStr 27 (+21)
Con 30 (+23)		Dex 19 (+17)
Int 15 (+15)		Wis 20 (+18)
Cha 17 (+16)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Athletics +26, Nature +23Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 28 | Insight 28
